Review.Contenu: I was a little shocked at the amount for the recovery. The reason for the high rating is that much of the information need for my business and personal use was recovered. I do recommend them but be ready for price. They are cheaper than other business I looked into before choosing Fields Data Recovery

Great service, recovered over 3000 pictures that included a deceased loved one. I thought Price was high until I realized what I had lost and had some extremely importing documents back. At that point, it became priceless. I would use again if needed, but I learned to back up, back up, back up!!

everything ended up working out fine.  We felt like it was pretty expensive.  I think we started out at $1200 and ended up settling for $400.  That is a pretty big swing, and seems like $400 is still a little steep.  I am sure there is a lot more that goes into data recovery than I am aware of.

This was the first time I have used a data recovery service, so I have nothing to compare it with.  That being said, the process was very painless, until the recovered data was received by me.  I had hoped for more recovered files (none of us want to loose anything), but was grateful for what was recovered.  Many of the files that were recovered could not be otherwise replaced or reconstructed.  It was time consumming on my part to take the recovered data and put it in a user friendly form on my new hard drive.

Fields Data Recovery was easy to work with and they did a great job recovering the data on my "deceased" hard drive.  I felt like the cost of almost $1,000 was extravagant but the pictures recovered were priceless.  That was the only down side of the experience.

Review.Titre: Full recovery of all data at a fair price.
Review.Contenu: Was apprehensive and nervous in the beginning.  After speaking with Todd on the phone I felt much better.  They were able to recover 99% of all data and it was all useable just as before.  If I have to complain about anything, I would say that the price was slightly on the high side, but this is a specialty field and the price was more than fair and in line with other companies that do this type of work.  Would have to recommend to anyone that needs their data recovered.  Todd was super nice to work with and easy to understand.

opened computer one day and it seemed no one was home.Our whole business is on it.But we are smart and we have an online backup service. so no problem? right?wrong!We have hundreds of drawings that we use a proprietary software to draw with.it seems that these drawings are placed and saved in a place that the online service doesn't cover!!So all was lost!!!!!Stumbled upon Fields data recovery and within a few days we had all our drawings back.Had to run to the bridge to go tell our CEO he can come down. All is well again.Thank you Fields.

Review.Titre: I called several times to find out if …
Review.Contenu: I called several times to find out if they determined the problem.  Each time I called I spoke with a tech who answered all of my questions.  The data recovery did not take more than a few days and the new usb drive arrived with the data as I had expected.  Very satisfied!

Review.Titre: Data recovered, more costly than originally quoted
Review.Contenu: The customer service is prompt and courteous, however the actual recovery quote once they had my hard drive (without clean room repairs) was more than double of what the phone recovery quote was. Only after I declined the service (I had only 2 months of data without backup) did they offer me a 25% discount. Although Still more that the original quote I approved the recovery. The data installed on a new portable hard drive was delivered within 2 days, most of my data was recovered. I  have a few files recovered without any data within the file. Overall A++

I had a iMac time machine backup on a non Apple device that I corrupted 6 or more years ago.  Sent it to them earlier this year and they were able to re over the day....a lot of family pictures where that back up was the only source.My one complaint is it was VERY EXPENSIVE.

Review.Titre: I had a good experience with Fields…
Review.Contenu: I had a good experience with Fields Data Recovery. Once I sent my Hard disk, Within a day or 2, I received a call about the results and shown a list of what files were recovered. Some folders were not recoverable and displayed as empty. Of those that were recovered, some files were corrupt. However, Many files were usable and I was able to get some valuable information back. I got 4 GB of data recovered. I am glad that Fields data recovery was able to help me. My quote was $850 but I managed to get a same day discount. I am now waiting for the original disk to be sent back to me..

Everything was great, got all my data back, it did take more time than expected but then again it was near thanksgiving. Great experience, customer service was good, sometimes hard to get in touch with them, but if you keep trying you will get ahold of them.

Review.Titre: i checked around and spoke to a few …
Review.Contenu: i checked around and spoke to a few companies and found Fields data recovery to have the expertise and very competitive pricing. They did not oversell their capabilities and delivered on what they promised. I would definitely use them again if I had the need.

Fields Data Recovery: Nice employees, easy to work with, very helpful. Diligent, thorough, and dedicated would be three words I’d use to describe the work which was done and the experience I had with Fields Data Recovery. I would definitely recommend them to others who are in need of data recovery.  Do note, the process wasn’t exactly timely as it took longer than expected. Fields Data Recovery was great in working with me on price point, but foreign transaction fees were charged to my account since the parent company of Fields Data Recovery is headquartered in the UK.

Information was recovered completely, it did take a little time for the price point to match my justification. In my case the information being recovered would makes thing easier long term, but none of the information was critical to my daily operations.

Like others, I was promised a list of recoverable files via email, but none was provided. The cost was much more than anticipated (predicted $600-$800) and ended up being over $1,100 for recovering less than 250 Gigs. I also was not informed up front of the foreign fund transfer fees. I am grateful that they recovered the files from my external drive, but I'm feeling that they took advantage of me financially. Did they accidentally do the work on a rush basis? It was done quicker than I instructed and expected. They were very good with customer service, with several phone calls keeping me abreast of the progress.

Review.Titre: Fields Data Recovery was a great…
Review.Contenu: Fields Data Recovery was a great service that helped me recover my files.  They were able to work with my financial situation and send a file list of the data they were able to recover before I paid for the service.  Would recommend.

Great news is that all of my data was recovered so A+ on that effort.   I had to manage/keep on top of the account managers to get timing & promises.   Overall I would use them again as they did a great job getting the lost data.

I sent in a 500 GB Hard drive that crashed on me. It was pretty full. They were only able to recover about 7 GB. It was better that nothing, but wished they could have recovered all of my data. I'll start keeping more backups from now own.

Everything happened exactly as they described - no surprises, they made their timelines, the data they were able to recover matched what they predicted. My only negative is the price was higher than I think it could be.

First off, let me say that in the end, I got exactly what I paid for. My data was recovered. The rep who worked with me kept me updated to the status of my work, sometimes with a bit of prodding. I paid for the expedited service, which I don't recommend. In the end, it still took about 5 weeks to get everything back. The cost was much higher than any quote I got, but in respect to the company, my issue was not easy to fix. Raid 0 striped, one of the disk's motor was shot and the read/write head was damaged. They had to do a lot of work to recover this data. In the end, the experience was pretty fair. I'd suggest doing a backup... it's cheaper by far...

The actual performance of data recovery was excellent. The time frame was slow, and pricing significantly higher than any other company I got quoted from. I am a firm believer in you get what you pay for so decided to go with them. After already committing to work with Fields Data Recovery, from a straight curiosity standpoint and my tech background asked some questions about why pricing was a certain level, the work involved, and why the time frame was so long (but a fraction of the time if I paid nearly double) they became rude and defensive. Was asking from a curiosity standpoint. 5 Stars for quality of work, 2 stars for customer service. I give them an extra star as they were easiest to get in touch with.

Cool company. Free evaluation.Definitely a tough decision when told the price of the recovery but all in all 98% recovery I was sold. Took a little bit longer to get it back than it was to get to them though.

Review.Titre: Fields Data did a very good job on…
Review.Contenu: Fields Data did a very good job on recovering my lost data from my hard drive. The process was easy but was expensive, but I needed the data recovered for my business. Thanks for your expertise in recovering my data.

I am glad I have my pictures and other files back that had been 'locked' away on my external hard drive that failed approx. 5 years ago.  Received all pictures, videos, and files back and they all appear to be in good working order with good integrity to the files.  Be prepared to negotiate if you would like to save some $$.  Initial quote was less than quotes I had received from other vendors offering the same service, but still a substantial amount of money for files with no business purpose.  Was able to negotiate down to a fee that I feel was easier to 'stomach' over the initial fee once the work was completed.  Quick turnaround and courteous service.

i needed files recovered from a usb that spontaneously stopped working and they were able to recover all files - easy to get in touch with the tech working on it for daily updates - speedy turn around and response time

Review.Titre: Well done, but much higher cost than estimate given.
Review.Contenu: I suggest that computer have at least two backup external drives to avoid data loss. Recovery is as costly as a root canal and estimates given may not be even close as in my case. $200-$400 estimated. $660 actual charge.

They took great care of me and my broken computer. They responded quickly and did a great job. The only complaint I have is that it is expensive!  But the pictures and videos were very important to me so it was worth it.

Great results, I got my data back in a useful form, and in a reasonable time.  It was complicated as I lost one disk in a 3 disk array, which they had to reconstruct.They kept me well informed how the recovery was progressing.I was pleasantly surprised at not having to pay for the reconstruction of the disk until after it was done.  I only had to pay once they had recovered the data, and told me how much they were able to retrieve.The cost did climb faster than I anticipated, but I only had to pay after I new how much data (but not which files) was recovered.My only concern was how fast the cost escalated higher than I anticipated.  But I did not have to pay until they had the data ready, and I gave my go ahead to send it back to me.They did a great job.

Its very expensive, but I got all my photos back and was glad for it.Luckily I saved them to a secondary drive when I got the new drive in, because the drive they used died within a week of getting my data back.

They were very up front about their service and how it worked, then they did exactly what they had offered.  I was grateful to know that I would get a price estimate and good estimate of the recoverable amount of data, prior to my committing to their service.  My only reason for a 4 star rating was because of the $ estimate.  It seemed to be high on the surface.  Their process appeared to take less than one half of a day, which made their cost larger than I thought any body's price should be.  Now in fairness to them, other estimates I received ranged from $700 to $1,300 for the same task, so their fee then became reasonable. But, they were good in their recovery, and we received all of the data that we were concerned about. so it was a good deal.

My only bit of constructive criticism, is the online advertising. The one piece of info that caught my eye was also the info that was most troublesome. Seeing a banner that says (very clearly) "Fix any drive for $199.99" and then to be given a price of $500 for the data recovery... it almost feels like (and I am not inclining it is so, just saying it FELT LIKE) the data had already been recovered, and I was negotiating a ransom for my data. To have to talk to 3 people and lose almost a day, it just seemed very awkward. If there is any reason for me to question a business relation with your company it was that situation. But still overall very satisfied. got the data for a price that it was worth.

Review.Titre: A struggle but a good result in the end
Review.Contenu: Fields does not seem to be able to get out of their own way.  I first talked to a Fields sales person who really had little idea about what they do.  At her urging, I sent in my dead disk drive and they immediately lost track of it.  Eventually they hooked me up with an account rep who had a little better idea of what they do, but still acted clueless most of the time.  He was able to track down my disk and get the techs started on recovering the data (after about 2 weeks of me waiting.)  In the end the data recovery worked great but the cost was much higher than I expected, $425 for 20GB of data.  I had been lead to believe that $199 was a reasonable expectation, and now I see that there are many shops that will do it for $99.

I had lost access to all data and did not have any back up for the files after hard drive failed.  Fields provided a professional and timely recovery of the data by repairing drive and transferring files.  I have had no issue accessing the data after they recovered them.  I had time sensitive files that I needed recovered immediately and they got the job done.  The service was pricey but I had no other choice due to my time constraints.  All customer service and technical aspects are five stars including follow up after delivery.  The only reason I did not give the full five stars is I did feel $900.00 was more then expected from the website's advertisements but price was provided prior to work and I could have shopped elsewhere.

Review.Titre: The work was perfect. A full recovery.
Review.Contenu: The work was great but the price was high compared to what is advertised. My case may have been more difficult than most though. If you reject the first quote, you will get a better one as you wait.
HDD of my client’s laptop failed, and Fields-Data-Recovery helped me to recover the data on the HDD.Obviously not all the data, but the team was able to recover some of the files.

Review.Titre: Although at first I was concerned about…
Review.Contenu: Although at first I was concerned about being asked to pay before the data was recovered, Adam worked around that and showed me the file names, at which point I GLADLY paid!  I understand the complex nature of what you do, and I am amazed that you were able to recover the data. THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!! -Fred

Review.Titre: Potentially Losing Data is a Scary Experience Until you talk to Fields Data Recover
Review.Contenu: It's an uncomfortable experience feeling you may have lost important data.  What I liked about Fields Data Recovery is that they made me feel comfortable from the start.  They didn't make any promises but they certainly gave me confidence we might get it back.  Business model is good and altruistic.  We didn't have any risk we had to take on during the evaluation of the failed device. Basically, they are doing a lot of the hard work for "free".  I place a lot of trust in this company from now on.

Review.Titre: They recovered way more than I expected…
Review.Contenu: They recovered way more than another company I took my device to. They gave me back so many baby videos and all the sentimental stuff I almost lost. Thank you!!!!
Excellent service and customer careThe followup with the customer, the speed for solving the problem, the technical support. Everything went smooth and fast.
They did everything required in half the time for half the price!

Review.Titre: They were able to retrieve my hard…
Review.Contenu: They were able to retrieve my hard drive information at a decent price compared to their competitors.

Review.Titre: Excellent service at all stages of data recovery.  A++
Review.Contenu: Fields-Data-Recovery has helped me a few times now to recover data from client's failed hard drives that I've been unable to recover with normal software tools.Fields provided free shipping to get the drive to them for analysis which was a huge help in selling the idea of the service to my clients so there was no obligation if the drive was deemed too expensive to recover or all-together unrecoverable.  Fields provided very quick  turn-around on their analysis of the drive(s) and gave me very accurate ideas on what data I could expect to recover along with time frames and a general cost window.I highly recommend using Fields Data Recovery for failed drive recovery!

After contacting several companies trying to charge me outrageous amounts I found Fields Data Recovery. They were able to answer all my questions with more. Walked me through the process every step of the way and recovered all my data for a reasonable price!

I was in a pinch after my external harddrive went down and took all of my design and video files with it. I couldn't find anybody who was able to scrape the data effectively. Finally I came across Field Data Recovery who sent me a pre-paid shipment box, contacted me every step of the way, and were able to pull everything off of the old drive. With the data now in hand I can say that it was a job well done and I'm glad to not have lost anything in the process!WO-007712

Their communication was solid & they were great at explaining what what was going on and impacts to the cost of recovery. They provided clear information of what they could recover so I could see how things went. Would definitely use again, even if I hope to never need to.

The first thing that was great is that they immediately reached out via call when I was still looking for options on where to go for the situation. They did not charge me to send my device to them. They constantly kept me update on the status via call. The process was a lot quicker and I got back data I did not expect to get back based on what I told them was important to me. So, I am grateful for their service.

Review.Titre: Thanks to Fields Data Recovery I’m one happy camper!!!
Review.Contenu: I am happy to report that I was able to locate all of my files on the disk drive that you sent me! You guys, particularly Julian Henson and Roger Caceres, are awesome! Thank you for the expert data recovery services and also your patience in assisting me retrieve the data! Your customer care was exceptional as I truly felt like I was your most important client throughout the entire process! I will certainly recommend your company to anyone that needs to recover lost data. Keep up the great work! Sincerely,Henry L. Williams

Review.Titre: Recovered all my family videos and photos
Review.Contenu: I had all of my family videos and photos on an external hard drive. Unfortunately the back-up I thought was happening... wasn't. Fields Data Recovery recovered everything! I especially liked that they sent the free shipping label, I was contacted by phone the next day when they received it. As they worked on the hard drive they called me to notified me of the daily progress. They were able to tell me what was on the hard drive before I committed to having them send it to me. Very professional. When I read the reviews I found it helpful to have an idea of what the cost might be... mine was around $1,300.

Review.Titre: I have used an external USB backup…
Review.Contenu: I have used an external USB backup device over a number of years, but recently I have not been able to access this drive.As most of my photographs seem to be lost, I seasoned that they were probably on this USB drive.I contacted Fields Data Recovery, and they agreed to look at the drive to see what files were on it.This was evidently quite a difficult job, which took some time.Fields recovered most (if not all) of my photos and other files, and returned them to me on a 1 Tb USB drive.I can't speak too highly of Fields, and I am delighted to have my photographs restored. Many thanks!

Review.Titre: It was a great experience and pleasure
Review.Contenu: It was a great experience and pleasure. The reps were so kind to keep me informed and I had their contacts if I had questions.  And I was so grateful that they saved most of my data which were years of Family Pictures.Thank you!!

Review.Titre: They went above and beyond to recover…
Review.Contenu: They went above and beyond to recover my data. Even worked with me on financing the recovery fees. Will definitely use this company again.Thanks again.

Review.Titre: They will get you your files back!
Review.Contenu: Fields Data Recovery was able to restore all my files from a hard drive I had dropped.  They did this within a week & for a price WAY more affordable than a company I had used previously for the same reason.

Highly would recommend this company. Start from first phone call they take care of everything : shipping label ,update about my hard drive, estimate cost repair, final price and fast shipping back to me. Very Professional !!! I'm just a guy who lost all family pictures and this company help me recover all back. Thanks again.

Review.Titre: I owe a lot of thanks to Fields Data…
Review.Contenu: I owe a lot of thanks to Fields Data Recovery for helping me recover all of my portfolio files from a broken hard drive. I was really stressed about the whole ordeal and the cost estimates I was getting back from other companies. I worked with Eric over the phone and explained my situation and he was able to meet me in a good spot price wise while being able to recover all of my data. I am really thankful for their service and highly recommend them to anyone needing data recovery.

They were real. No bots to deal with. Always real people. Although I know/knew they were a large company, yet they always dealt with me personally and expeditiously.  I didn't have to spend a penny until they had my damaged drive in their hands and told what they could do and what to expect in recovery.  The damaged disk contained all of my 50,000 or so images gathered over the entire history of digital cameras (and a few from the dark ages before there were digital machines) What they did was recover 95% of what was on the Terabyte disk.

Called about 9 data recovery services prior to getting external hard drive data recovered.  Chose Fields due to lower end on cost spectrum (which is expensive throughout) and good service.  Expensive but worth it!  Videos and photos of my mother and  children were well worth it.

Review.Titre: An external hard drive that we use as…
Review.Contenu: An external hard drive that we use as archive for old files stopped working without warning. We thought the data was lost forever but Fields Data Recovery was able to access the data and get us a new drive with all of our data intact. Door-to-door the entire process took less than a week. It was completely painless and their communication throughout the process was stellar.

I sent in 6 drives for recovery and Fields Data recovered a great deal of vital archived projects. I am extremely satisfied with their service and Adam Bievenue who was my account manager was professional and informative throughout the process.Thanks again!

Review.Titre: THE BEST COMPANY IN RECOVERY DATAThe professionalism in their service is…
Review.Contenu: The professionalism in their service is incredible. Excellent customer service, unfair price on their services, I will say low, understanding of their customers' needs, all this makes them #1 in this trade. Thanks to all their work team that made it possible to recover 100% of my work for more than 20 years. I highly recommend this company. May God bless you all!

I recently reached out to Fields Data Recovery to try to get old family pictures and videos from a crashed/non-working hard-drive. In addition to restoring photos from two Christmases, and three vacations, they were able to restore pictures of my dogs when they were young/puppies. They had both recently passed away after being beloved family members for over 14 years. That was the catalyst that lead me to stop putting off sending the drive in to be restored. Needless to say I cried tears of joy when I saw pictures and videos of them young, healthy, and active that I had been missing for a decade. Well worth every penny.

Review.Titre: We all know you should back-up your…
Review.Contenu: We all know you should back-up your hard drive/portable drive at set intervals. Okay - knowing and doing are two different things. Yes, I failed to back up my portable HD. I store most everything on it keeping my desktop HD free of clutter. Sure enough the Seagate failed. What a nightmare. I contacted several data recovery companies before settling on Fields-Data-Recovery. From the sales staff to the desk technician, they are all professional. They explained the process, the time line and what I could expect. They worked with me to ensure my satisfaction and expectations. I strongly recommend this group for all of your data recovery needs. (I don't write many reviews but this group deserves my review praise)

Review.Titre: Entire process was very simple and fast
Review.Contenu: Entire process was very simple and straight forward: package was picked up by UPS, (there was some confusion in picking up the package but was resolved immediately). Rep explained entire process ,   discussed about extent of work, and possible scenarios. It was simple and easy.Rep was very professional, explained entire process and finally informed me about success.Payment was processed, and new portable Hard drive with rescued data arrived again by UPS. Entire campaign took less then 10 days.I am satisfied with entire process and product that I got at the end.

Not cheap but worth it! Failed 4TB Seagate external hard drive containing valuable company data had crashed. I had sent it back to Seagate in Holland who said it was unrecoverable. After online contact Fields Data Recovery collected it FOC via DHL, advised of potential cost, diagnosed a mechanical fault ('head failure'), advised final cost, repaired it, recovered 95% of the data and sent me a brand new EHD, all within 2 weeks. Excellent service and not a con like some disgruntled competitors claim online. Thanks Dan & the team!

Review.Titre: My experience with Fields was awesome
Review.Contenu: My experience with Fields was awesome.  Contacted them with my issue.  Next day got the ball rolling with recovering the data off my external hard drive.  Decades worth of pictures we’re on the line.  They recovered everything I lost.  The did so all within a couple days of receiving my device. Price was fair.  I didn’t really compare prices and no one I know has ever used a company like this.  Overall great experience.

Review.Titre: Julian reached out to me when  was…
Review.Contenu: Julian reached out to me when  was looking to recover data from an old SATA drive that was about 10 years old. All personal info, not business stuff, but it had data, family pictures and personal docs that I would have had a hard time replacing. He gave me a quote, stuck to it, and kept me updated. I also got a file list of everything they recovered ( which was everything). Other clean rooms quoted me in the thousands!! good bunch of folks, and would highly recommend them

I am a musician who had the worst possible nightmare happen, I had a hard drive "die" with several years of my studio recordings stored on it!! Fortunately, I contacted Fields-Data-Recovery. They were very professional and helpful from the start. The technician clearly explained how the process works, how long it would take and the steps to receive a quote for recovery. Let me be clear, they are not cheap!! But if you have irreplaceable data on a failed drive you owe it to yourself to at last speak with Fields. Good news, they were able to recover the entire drive for me!! I highly recommend this company.

Review.Titre: Quick Service, Easy to Deal With, and Reasonable Prices
Review.Contenu: I had a GREAT experience with Fields Data. They kept me informed every step of the way and had the recovered data back in my hands within two weeks. Also, the cost was incredibly reasonable for a 5TB external hard drive. Last year, I used a different company for a failed camera card. They promised 24-hours diagnostics, 2-weeks for recovery, etc. They failed on every promise: Diagnostics took 10-days, recovery was 6-weeks, zero communication, and cost an arm and a leg. Fields Data was a breath of fresh air! Where the other company failed, Fields Data excelled on every promise. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

Review.Titre: I used Fields Data Recovery twice in…
Review.Contenu: I used Fields Data Recovery twice in the last three years.  The first drive needed to be rebuilt and the second two had only minor issues.  In both cases my data was recovered completely and very quickly.Their staff returns calls and emails promptly and follows up after the data is returned to the customer.Though very expensive for ‘the average person’, I trust and recommend Fields Data Recovery

My passport drive wouldn’t open the files on it. I called Fields Data Recovery and they were very helpful. Emailed a address label immediately with paid postage. They let me know in a few days my data could be recovery and provided a flash drive with my recovered data. In my several phone conversations they kept me informed and were very professional.They provided a good service and I recommend them.

Review.Titre: They were able to recover the majority…
Review.Contenu: They were able to recover the majority of my data that I thought I had completely lost. Great communication from the time they received my external drive to the time it was shipped and they completed the job in a very timely manner.

A drive on a twelve year old CNC machine failed and we were unable to locate a backup image. Fields Data Recovery managed to recover over 95% of the data and saved me a lot of time rebuilding an old Windows XP machine. We got the machine back in production with minimal down time. This is a service that no one hopes to use, but I am very grateful that they exist when I needed them.

Great service! We had a complex RAID failure. Daniel at Fields stayed in constant contact, they did a free diagnosis, and I felt confident they could restore our data. Ultimately we couldn't afford the price, but they were clear and transparent about cost at every step along the way. Would use again!

I dropped my external, backup drive and it became nonfunctional.   Found Fields Data Recovery online.  Original price quote was higher than expected.  After researching my drive further and realizing that the recovery task was not as complicated as originally thought, Fields required an acceptable price and the work was completed in 2 days.  I am extremely happy with their prompt and professional service and will employ them again if I ever require data recovery assistance.  Well worth the price paid.  With Fields, you are going to get your money's worth no matter what the cost!

Fields Data Recovery was tremendously helpful and responsive. I called the number and immediately they explained how easy the process is and how there was no obligation if they couldn't recover any data. They kept me informed of each stage, when they received the hard drive, when they were able to determine the availability of files, and what the next steps would be. Sending the hard drives to them was quick and easy, and they had my recovered data on my new hard drive and mailed out to me the same day, along with follow-up emails and calls to inform me of the progress. I will use them again without hesitation if I run into the problem again.

Review.Titre: Fields Data Recovery (FDR)  was able to…
Review.Contenu: Fields Data Recovery (FDR)  was able to quickly recover all of our family photos. The internal hard disk with our family photos failed.   FDR paid for the disk shipments to and from their lab.  The lab recovered the photos the next day after the disk arrived at the lab. Their representative kept us informed of each step in the process.  Their recovery cost is comparable to the other labs that do hard disk failure data recovery.  I recommend Fields Data Recovery and would use them again.

Review.Titre: Successfuly recoved old family photographs & videos!
Review.Contenu: A hard drive crashed that held a lot of old family photographs and videos. The local shop where we normally take our computers was unable to retrieve the data and said we would need to go to a company that specialized in data recovery. I searched the internet and selected Fields-Data-Recovery.They were responsive  and very communicative.  After shipping off the drive, they called and said they could retrieve the data and emailed a file directory which looked complete. A few days later, an external hard drive arrived with the data on it. The whole process took 7-10 days and they kept me informed at every step. I would use their services again, if needed.

Fields data recovery recovered the data from my failed hard drive.  The service was fast and professional.  I started wanting to recover photos I had backed up using the hard drive, I’m still going through the recovered data and finding things I didn’t know I was missing.  Great job, Thanks

Review.Titre: My IT department couldn't recover my…
Review.Contenu: My IT department couldn't recover my data, but Fields Data Recovery got almost everything back. When my work Windows CPU just died and wouldn't reboot at all, I thought I lost everything including some important paperwork and video files that I had not had a chance to back up yet. Data Recovery was able to get all the files I needed and even worked with me on the cost to keep in within my work budget! I would most definitely recommend them if your system dies. They can get your stuff back and get it back to you fast!

Review.Titre: We had an SSD that failed with data…
Review.Contenu: We had an SSD that failed with data that had not been backed up in over two years. This had Bit-Locker drive encryption and although we had the key, we could not get the drive to be recognized by any of our recovery software. fields-data-recovery.com was able to retrieve the data and got it to us a week earlier than we were expecting. They did a great job and saved our staff member countless hours recreating the scripts that were recovered. I highly recommend their services.

When my hard drive crashed, i just knew everything was lost, but I started looking for some help. When I found Fields Data Recovery, they sounded optimistic that they could recover most of the data. After a reasonable amount of time, they did recover some of the most important data and I was able to get back to work without having to start all over.

Fields-data-recovery helped retrieve 100% of what was on a failed La Cie 5 TB portable hard drive.  They response was timely in terms of reviewing the drive and letting me know if it was recoverable.   They were also timely with regard to recovering the data and sending me a portable Hard drive mounted with the lost data.   I would recommend them to anyone.

Fields Data Recovery was able to recover my external hard drive after my own IT team had put it through the ringer with an unsuccessful recovery. They did it very quickly and were very prompt with responses, follow up, etc. I was very pleased with the outcome.

From the moment my package was picked up, to the moment my package was delivered back with all my retrieved data was literally days.  They were very quick and always kept me informed of what was going on with my data.  Every representative I spoke with respectful and informative.  They were able to give me back every single piece of data I lost!

I had an old Seagate mechanical hard-drive that stored all of my photo collections from traveling abroad around 2008-2009. After having a close family member pass away, I wanted to look at and possibly print some of the images I knew were on the drive. I couldn't access it and after searching online I chose Fields Data Recovery. I'm really glad I did; from the time I applied for a quote to the time I received my recovered data was only about a week, and the recovery was 100% successful. Granted, it was pricey but the images recovered were priceless. Their team was very communicative throughout the whole process and I was extremely satisfied.

I had 5 external hard drives that did not successfully make the journey from Arizona to Washington last winter.  They contained many many 100s of photos that I had taken over the last 20 years. I was devastated to lose those photos.I contacted Fields Data Recovery via their website and within 2 weeks I had a new drive containing the recovered photos and other data on 4 of the drives.  I opted not to process the 5th drive - it needed to be rebuilt.The service is expensive but the free shipping by air before they did a free diagnostic and a free listing of folders on each hard drive was a great service before committing to the recovery itself.A great service

During the height of the pandemic, I took an external hard drive filled with all of my important files home from the office to use on my personal laptop. The drive contained the bulk of my daily workload. When it became corrupted, I was distraught. My IT department recommended Fields Data Recovery. They were able to recover all of the files I thought were lost forever. Countless Word docs, Excel Spreadsheets, PowerPoints and other valuable information was recovered. They accomplished the task quickly - with excellent customer service - keeping me apprised of the data recovery every step of the way.

Review.Titre: Fields Data Recovery was recommended by IT
Review.Contenu: Fields Data Recovery was recommended to me by my local IT person after my 10 year old hard drive crashed and the data could not be retrieved locally. FDR was very professional and did a great job in keeping me informed throughout the retrieval process. They repaired the hard drive and was able to extract all the information off of it, and then sent the information back to me by an expedited thumb drive. I would use them again if the need arises.

Once I requested service online the customer service response was quick, efficient, and very calm. They were able to get my device picked up the same day and I had an answer about my dad within a week of it arriving at their facility. I was amazed and so happy to have a quick service and the amount of data that was able to be recovered.

Fast and wonderful service!The hard drive spun but electronics were dead.  Fields was able to replace the electronics and retrieve a ton of photos, drawings, and documents that were one of a kind and took years of work to put together.  All this retrieved within a few days!

Fields Data Recovery is fantastic!From the moment I inquired about their services, Fields Data Recovery was right there to help. They offered to examine my damaged 300GB hard drive for free, and pay for the shipping back and forth (admittedly, it's a small box)."You were absolutely right," said the rep, confirming my suspicion the drive's armature was knocked out of place by the fall. He told me recovery could be very quick, and even offered me a fantastic discount.I'm very, very please with this company. I've become more vigilant on making backups, and have switched to SSD. All data disks fail eventually, but I feel very confident knowing Fields Data Recovery is a safety net I can count on.

The great communication through the entire process was awesome.  I was kept up to date as things went a long.  The price was a very fair price and the expediency of delivery of the data once it was recovered.

Review.Titre: Hard drive suddenly died and was unable…
Review.Contenu: Hard drive suddenly died and was unable to access any of our files. Field Data Recovery did an excellent job and managed to recover 100% of our files. Up and running again within days. Highly recommend them.

Review.Titre: My computer crashed a few months ago
Review.Contenu: My computer crashed a few months ago.  There were over 15 yrs (30 Gb files) of highly technical work on those hard drives.  I had a RAID configured system with 2 hard drives that a typical store couldn't fix; said they were unfixable.  So I looked around and took a chance on Fields and sent the drives to them.  They were able to recover all of the files, not the software though.  Still, I was ecstatic until I saw the bill for several thousand dollars.

Review.Titre: Full data recovery in record time
Review.Contenu: Fields Data Recovery did a great job recovering all the data from my crashed 2 TB External Hard Drive!  They did it in record time - just a few days.I hope my EHD's don't ever crash again, but if they do, I would definitely use Fields Data Recovery.

Review.Titre: After dropping an external hard drive…
Review.Contenu: After dropping an external hard drive on a tile floor, it no longer worked. We were pretty devastated to lose years worth of pictures, documents, and files. Googling, I found Fields Data Recovery. Everyone I talked to here was very nice and professional. I sent them my device, had a report 24 hours later, and received a jump drive back containing everything from the external in less than a week! They had quoted me a price bracket, and the total cost was within that bracket. Yes this seemed expensive; but it was worth it to us. We'd definitely use their services again if needed.

Review.Titre: Rebuilding broken drive - got all the really important stuff back!
Review.Contenu: Was able to take my son's badly abused college system's hard drive and recover all the important (and a lot of not-very-important) data from his senior thesis, etc.They had to re-build his hard-drive since it had suffered head damage, was amazed at their ability to re-construct the drive itself, and then pull meaningful data off of it.Shortly after receiving the data, was sorting thru to eliminate not-very-important stuff and managed to accidently delete some of his most important data.  I called back to see if they retained his data and would be willing to send me a replacement.  They did so gladly (and quickly, I might add).  Son's data is in his possession once again.Thanks for your expertise recovering critical data for my son!

Review.Titre: Great turnaround time on getting my…
Review.Contenu: Great turnaround time on getting my data back. I was very pleased to be able to have my damaged hard drive cloned so I could just put the new one right back in to my computer. If you want your data back, just remember that it does comes with a price -- but if you need to get your business back on track quickly, I definitely recommend Fields Data Recovery!

Review.Titre: I had a failed portable 250GB WD Drive
Review.Contenu: I had a failed portable 250GB WD Drive. I had called Fields Data Recovery and they shipped me a mailing label right away. They were able to recover all the data on the drive and gave me a preview on line of al the files that would be recovered. Once I confirmed, they proceeded with the drive recovery and mailed it out right away on a 250GB USB Stick. Great service and communication, Thanks for recovering data that I should have saved to the cloud.

Fields Data was incredible. Since I was a student, they were able to help make the recovery process more affordable to me, which was really helpful because I was afraid I had lost almost a year of hard work on my thesis. And although they were not able to recover all the data, a large portion was, and I didn't have to start all my projects from scratch. In addition, they had someone update me almost every other day with the status of my drive, which really helped ease my nerves during the whole process. If I ever need to use this service again or recommend anyone, I would definitely be coming to them.
They got me exactly the data they said they could recover in a timely manner. I tried personal recovery tools first and was unsuccessful. They really helped me out when I needed it most.

I experienced a failure of the read/write heads in my harddrive.  I had a few but scattered backups, but not enough to fully restore the HDD contents.  I compared several data recovery services and found Fields Data Recovery to be the most promising offer.FDR provided good communications with me about the transport & return of the HDD & recovered data.  Their estimated time table for process events was reasonable short and they held to it.  The cost was a shock, but competetive with other data recovery estimates.Recovered data was transferred to a USB 1Tb SSD and shipped back to me.  Following the instructions FDR supplied it transferred to my new computer cleanly & quickly without difficulties.  The original hierarchy of my folder & file system was nicely preserved.This was a costly path for which there are well known preventative alternatives for.  That said, when no other method will work, this one should be considered.

Review.Titre: Excellent service with a very good initial interface!
Review.Contenu: Very good initial interface, customer service, and follow-up. The initial website experience was great, which was promptly followed up on the next day. The service isn’t cheap but is very good. Data was recovered from the crashed hard drive and returned to me in a very usable media configuration. The interaction with made this effort very easy. All I had to do was print a shipping label, get the drive packaged and delivered to a UPS store for shipping. The rest was done by them. The what happens next was very well explained, with continued progress reporting. I would definitely recommend them to others with similar issues. Thanks for a job well done!

Review.Titre: I had my external hard drive freeze up
Review.Contenu: I had my external hard drive freeze up. Fields was prompt in sending out a UPS shipping label, and they communicated with me through the whole process. I received several update and follow up calls. The data was all recovered and sent back promptly. Great Service.
Great customer service team providing work update and answering queries. Engineers were able to retrieve my data from my fried SSD in a short period of time. Good job guys 👍

Great experience with Fields Data Recovery. I contacted them and was given a call moments later and a shipping label shortly after that. UPS pickup was arranged, I just had to find a box to put my busted HD in. A few days later I got a call and approved the cost to perform a complete data recovery. I was informed every step of the way.

They were true to their word. They provided a file listing after initial disk troubleshooting and review, and gave us a delivery date - and then stuck to it. My wife was very happy to have her files back in working order. We had a 1Tb disk that failed and they were able to recover everything we were looking for. I have no problem recommending them for your data recovery needs.

I know, I should have kept backups of our family photos and small business files - but I didn't!  So on that fateful morning when my external hard drive crashed, I was in a panic!  I reached out to Fields Data Recovery and they promptly explained their services and the process. They provided a handy UPS label and I shipped the drive right away.  Their staff was professional and communicated promptly.  AND, they were able to restore ALL OF MY FILES quickly and at a fair price.  I was very impressed with their service and would gladly recommend Fields Data Recovery.

Fields Data Recovery is nothing short of awesome.  Extremely professional and very thorough in there work.  Without question should I have another need for data recovery.. Fields will be my number one choice!

Review.Titre: My life was on my external hard drive, and Fields got it back for me
Review.Contenu: My life was on my external hard drive: family photos, work-related documents, teaching aids, etc. Suddenly, it stopped working. I'd used Field Data Recovery at a previous place of employment and found them to be prompt, efficient, and great at updating me on the status of the recovery. As we were going to be visiting the St. Louis area, I was hoping to find a firm based there to do the recovery. I called one of the competitors and explained the situation, and I was told I couldn't drop the disk off and it didn't matter because they shipped it to a lab in Ohio to be worked on. Was this pricy? Absolutely. But they recovered >95% of the data and did so ahead of their stated timetable. In addition, they kept me apprised of where things stood and what the next steps would be. All in all, a great experience.

Losing data is stressful. Sending all your data off to hopefully be recovered is hard. These guys were able to recover almost all my data, and I got it all on a new drive within a week (I was not in a big rush, or I believe it could have been faster). The price was a little steeper than I expected, but they worked with me to make sure I could get it covered by my business insurance.

Fields data recovery was excellent. My issue was a broken connect for the SATA cable. They provided an overnight UPS label for me to send in the drive. They contacted me in 2 days time to let me know that they recovered my data. Price was great considering other places that would charge over 1K. They over nited my drive on a portable disk and I was able to transfer everything over. I did not have to pay for any shipping!  Highly recommend Fields Data recovery! All of my apps and music and photos/videos were recovered!

Thank you, Fields Data, for recovering all my valuable data. Without this, I would have lost years of personal and business work I had compiled including not only transactions but all my contacts.I can not thank you enough.Charles D. Carter
They recovered my hard-drive that was over a decade old.They communicated frequently during the process. I was very satisfied with the outcome.Reference - WO-005722

Review.Titre: I was very nervous about using a data…
Review.Contenu: I was very nervous about using a data retrieval company. I spoke to several different companies, but felt most confident after speaking with the Fields Data Recovery agent. we maintained communication and in the end, I was able to get back the important data that was lost on the hard drive crash.

Very helpful! I had lost all my personal memories (fotos and videos) and this service recovered it all. They are very organized and efficient, in one week is was all solved, they return my data in a new device of good quality. Their communication is great, they answer to all my emails and questions promptly. I recommend!

After A Series Of Unfortunate Events my external harddrive refused to play nice. Bad news as it had over a decade's worth of work on it and my cloud backup wasn't working. I found fields data recovery from a google search. Contacted them and explained the issue, sent them the harddrive, got a new one back with all my goodies. MASSIVE relief on my part. Pricey (to me, but i AM a total cheapskate lol) but worth every penny. Stress free, speedy, and kept me in the loop. Highly recommended, if I'm ever stuck like that again I'll be straight back to them.

I appreciated the no-cost, no-obligation initial assessment. The Field's team responded to my inquiry about services within the hour and communicated through every step of the process. They completed what was a complicated recovery and returned the data within a week, including shipping time both ways. Staff were all professional, friendly, and competent. I hope not to need their services again, but will not hesitate to choose Fields if I do!

Review.Titre: Excellent experience after a failed experience somewhere else
Review.Contenu: Fields Data Recovery got my wedding pictures and my son's newborn hospital baby pictures back after another 5 star data recovery company with a high success rate in my area couldn't do it.I had sent inquiries to a few different companies. I chose the local company first because I was hesitant to send my hard drive through the mail. I was gutted that they were unsuccessful. I almost threw out my hard drive!!Soon after, I got a follow up email from Fields to see if I still needed help. After receiving clear, friendly, and efficient communication, I decided to give it another shot since they provided a free shipping label via email to get my hard drive out to them. Also, they offer a free evaluation. Nothing to lose!Julian, the account manager, was the nicest - I appreciate great customer service and he truly provided that. He kept me informed every step of the way via phone calls, emails, and voicemail messages.Anywhere you go, data recovery is expensive. I see a lot of people in the reviews complaining about the price. Fields ended up being less expensive than the place that was unsuccessful.I like that Fields will send you a link where you can look at all the data they can recover before you decide to purchase.Julian told me I would get my data back in 3-4 weeks after I told him time wasn't an issue. But I ended up receiving a hard drive w my data the same week he told me the good news that they could recover my data. He told me on a Monday and I received my recovered data on Friday!I would definitely recommend using this company. I couldn't have had a better experience. It's such a hard thing to lose important files. Customer service reps need to be compassionate, and that's exactly what I got from Julian and his team.

Fields Data Recovery does exactly what it says, when it says. The process was smooth and easy from the moment of first contact until final delivery. I appreciated this since the experience of losing data is never an easy one. The customer service is impeccable

Review.Titre: Highest Praise for Service and Overall Help
Review.Contenu: I am pasting the note I sent to Fields Data Recovery after their excellent service this month, saving what could have been a catastrophic loss of data on the external hard drive on which I had backed up all of my writing and video footage of a concert series I ran for years.  "I want to thank you, deeply, for making this so easy for me!  I have already sung the praises of Fields Data to let people know that you were able successfully to retrieve and share my data with me.  That you were then willing and able to share it in an Apple format will have me sing louder!  Thank you!  I appreciate your good care with my data and your personal attention to my needs.  Excellent customer service!"
Complete recovered my data and transferred it to another drive. They accomplished this within a week and for less than a third of the price of any competitor.

SAVED MY BUSINESS. My name is Tyler and I run a DJ Business. I had a drive with 40k files crash on me and it was the master backup I had for my business containing everything I needed to run my business this summer. I worked with Aaron who was an absolute pleasure, they kept me updated through the whole process, paid for shipping and even supplied me with a cost free consultation on service. I would give this company a 10/10 every time.

Review.Titre: Great experience and got my data back
Review.Contenu: I sent my external drive off to them and the process was so easy! customer service was definitely 5 star. They communicated very well and kept me updated on every step that was being taken and explained it if needed. They called and emailed frequently during the process. Also, I felt like it was all done so quickly, the entire process from start to finish.  I felt like the price was fair, as well. Luckily they were able to retrieve all my files for me (84k+ files). I would definitely use them again, and recommend them for anyone who has had anything crash on them. My drive was unretrievable through several different programs I used and a couple people trying.  I am so thankful to have all my memories back.

My personal external hard drive with all of the family photos, videos and memories on it quit working. I found this service as they were recommended to me by a family friend.  I received the memory stick with all of the data very quickly once payment for data recovery was made, and am so thankful to have all of my information and family memories recovered!

Review.Titre: The team at field data recovery was…
Review.Contenu: The team at field data recovery was efficient, communicative, and understanding. I trusted them with my most sensitive data and they walked me through the entire process from having my damaged external drive picked up at my home to the safe delivery of a replacement drive with all of my information restored. It was a scary time but they put my mind at ease by providing prompt responses and ultimately delivery of a great product. I highly recommend them.

Review.Titre: Excellent Service From The Fields Data Recovery Support Team
Review.Contenu: I found the Fields Data Recovery support team from a Google search. The Support Team contacted me right away after I completed an online form. I explained that I dropped my 1 TB Hitachi external HDD. Now, the drive was clicking.After the telephone conversation, I was emailed a UPS Overnight label. The Support Team telephoned me once they received the HHD. I mailed the Support Team my damaged 1 TB Hitachi external HDD and 2 TB LaCie drive to transfer any recoverable dataThe very same day, the Support Team informed me to the diagnostics, for the drive, and what they had to do to cover the data.The entire process of mailing the failed drive, recovering the data and returning the LaCie took about four business daysThe Support Team emailed the recovered data is kept for seven business days. After seven days, the Support Team made follow up call to ensure all was well and suggested cloud-based data storage

Very understanding and completely empathetic to my needs. They worked quickly to get my data back to me but unfortunately most of it was not recoverable. What they were able to recover was very valuable though. I am considering a second data recovery on another hard drive because they were so wonderful to work with on the first one! I would recommend them for data recovery!

Very courteous, helpful, and knowledgeable team. They successfully recovered the data from a laptop hard drive and an external hard drive. I’m very thankful for their services and communications along the way.

Review.Titre: The whole process was very smooth and…
Review.Contenu: The whole process was very smooth and they kept me posted every step of the way.

Everyone at Fields Data Recovery were really quick to respond. Communication was really good. I got updates for every step and the no obligations was very comforting. The baseline cost is the cheapest I found. I was told that most other companies are sending devices to them and can upcharge shipping. I checked a couple other places and I believe that.I ended up with a replacement hard drive. There was some shuffling of data which was anticipated, but all the data I was expecting was there. One warning: if they send you a data list, check it. I ended up with duplicate files and a ton of weird trash files, so that likely increased the price.  I didn't check before hand, and that probably would have saved me a lot of time and money.

Review.Titre: Their attention to know all the details…
Review.Contenu: Their attention to know all the details before starting a project is outstanding.Everything was done in a very rapid manner and everything promised was equally perfect.Almost a terabyte of documents and they recovered it all.I will recommend them to all of my contacts.
Very easy to work with!!  Awesome communication!!   Kept me informed to everything going on!  Sent shipping label via email and just dropped the package off.  Highly recommend!!!
Service was fast. Communications were clear. The recovery was successful and data was returned securely. Throughout the process staff was friendly and easy to work with.

They worked with me, described what I needed to have done, and gave me an accurate time frame. All of my personal data was recovered. Pictures that dated back decades, to some more recent ones of my children while they where very young, and others while I served in the Army stationed overseas in Korea. They sent the data back to me on a USB and I received it when they said I would. Great place, expensive, but well worth it, I would use again if needed.

We used Field's Data Recovery Services to recover data from our organization's storage drive, that was corrupt and unreadable. The part I like the most about this services provider is they're stress free no obligation offer, they don't charge a penny until you actually take services. If you decide not to takes services, they ship the drive back at no cost which I believe is they're best selling point vs the competition. I really enjoyed the customer service they gave us, explaining every step of the process and following up on the work history. They're data recovery services were very reliable and accurate as all of our data was saved by them like eureka!
